title: The VFL 1st semi final: [Richmond vs Geelong 1969]
brief_description: First semi final 1969, Richmond vs Geelong. Film shows third and fourth quarters at the Melbourne Cricket Ground with final scores Richmond 25 goals 17 behinds 167 points defeating Geelong 7 goals 7 behinds 49 points.
